item.title: LA fires live updates: Edison International can't rule out role of equipment
item.description: At least 24 people are believed to be dead and more than a dozen others remain unaccounted for as multiple wildfires rage across Southern California.

item.title: Tsunami advisory lifted after strong earthquake hits Japanese coast
item.description: The U.S. Geological Survey put the quake’s preliminary magnitude at 6.8.

item.title: Trump's former co-defendants continue push to block release of Jack Smith's report
item.description: With the order blocking the release of special counsel Jack Smith's report on his Trump probes set to expire today, lawyers continue to spar over the ...

item.title: LA wildfires maps show evacuations, power outages, air quality
item.description: Wildfires are tearing through thousands of acres in Los Angeles County in California, as strong Santa Ana winds stoke the blazes.

item.title: WATCH: Extreme winds return to fire zone in Los Angeles
item.description: ABC News’ Ginger Zee has the latest on the extreme wind warnings in Southern California.
